alert.note: Alert for Davidson (North Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 09 at 7:31PM EDT by NWS Raleigh
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Davidson County through 815 PM EDT... At 728 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 8 miles south of Bermuda Run, or 8 miles east of Mocksville, moving southeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds up to 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Lexington, Linwood, Denton, Gordontown, High Rock Boat Dock Marina, Welcome, Nc Wildlife Access Boat Launch, High Rock Lake Marina & Campground, High Rock and High Rock Lake. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
